Text: Pippa Hinchley:  One of her earliest TV roles was as a teenaged holidaymaker in Michael Palin's drama "East of Ipswich" (1986), set in Southwold in the 1950s.

Text: Pippa Hinchley:  She also appeared in the films "Secret Places" (1984), "Dead Man's Folly" (1986) and "The Dressmaker" (1988), and on TV in "Last of the Summer Wine", "People Like Us" and " Touch".
